quoted.text: Based on preliminary research, no company in history has grown EBITDA 41% at an annual rate, or ~30-fold, over 10 years. If Elon and team meet these goals, the impact will be much greater than on Tesla alone: productivity and real GDP growth will accelerate meaningfully, auto fatalities will drop more than 50%, and all Tesla shareholders‚Äîimportantly, its employees and their families‚Äîwill become more wealthy than they ever dreamed possible.
